Posts.Content: Faithhope35 wrote: I went to my doctor yesterday to discuss going on this drug for preventing recurrence as well as bone loss. Turns out it's $1200 every 6 months. I'm in Canada where it's not covered. I'm 44yrs old & post menopausal from having my ovaries removed in sept as a preventative measure. I'm 1 yr out from treatment for stage 3 bc & am terrified of recurrence & want to do all I can. Any thoughts? Dx 11/10/2015, IDC, Left, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, 4/9 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Faithhope35 wrote: after reading one of the posts I tried out cancer math. As a stage 3er I've always gone on I have about a 30 % chance of recurrence. This is unsettling & im trying to find some peace with it. However, I went on cancer math & plunked in my numbers 5cm, 4 nodes & it said a 42% chance of recurrence. I'm just sick about it! Anyone know anything about this tool Dx 11/10/2015, IDC, Left, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, 4/9 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
